prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a bat with vibrant blue and purple colors.
Imagine a flying-type creature with large wings and a mischievous grin.
Design a Pokemon that lives in caves and has a sleek, aerodynamic shape.
Give me a bat-like Pokemon with a unique ability to drain energy from opponents.
Generate an image of a dual-type Pokemon that embodies both poison and flying traits.
Show me a Pokemon that can be found in dark places and has a striking color palette.
Make a creature that combines the features of a bat and a mythical guardian.
